text: Albert Wood (25 April 1903 – 1965) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1965 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Seaham Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Seaham Harbour F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Crewe Alexandra F.C. players Category:Tranmere Rovers F.C. players Category:New Brighton A.F.C. players Category:Hartlepool United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Albert Wood (footballer)
